member.name: FILEPATHS_SIGNERINFO
member.summary: The FILEPATHS_SINGNERINFO structure stores source and target path information, and also file signature information. The setup functions sendFILEPATHS_SIGNERINFO as a parameter in several of the notifications sent to callback routines. For more information, seeNotifications.

member.name: FILEPATHS_SIGNERINFO.Source
member.summary: Path to the source file. This member is not used when the structure is used with a file delete operation.

member.name: FILEPATHS_SIGNERINFO.Win32Error
member.summary: If an error occurs, this member is the system error code. If no error has occurred, it is NO_ERROR.

summary.para: Additional information that depends on the notification sent with theFILEPATHS_SIGNERINFO structure.
ForSPFILENOTIFY_COPYERROR notifications, Flags specifies dialog box behavior and can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Do not offer the user the option to browse.
Do not offer the user the option to skip the file.
Inform the user that skipping the file may affect the installation.

summary.para: ForSPFILENOTIFY_FILEOPDELAYED notifications, Flags specifies the type of file operation delayed and can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: A file copy operation was delayed.
A file delete operation was delayed.
